website_summaries.verdict: On a tight budget but need a good pair of water shoes? Then these are the shoes for you. Just pay attention to the size chart (medium to triple-XL).
pros: Soft and flexible for extra comfort
One of the most affordable, highly rated water shoes on the market
cons: Because they're made of fabric, they take more time to dry than water shoes that are designed with mesh
Some buyers said that the seams started to come apart after a few wears as well

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes but didn't last =(
customer_reviews.text: These were great until the started falling apart. Sadly I only wore twice before they started to go. If the quality of the sewing and string used to sew with was better perhaps these would last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Albert V.

customer_reviews.title: Great water socks with a little support
customer_reviews.text: Wore these for a weekend at an indoor water park. Not a ton of support, but for the money & without feeling like I'm wearing shoes in water, they're good. And it's better than bare feet for sure. I wear a 9 1/2 usually, sometimes a 9 1/2 WIDE or even a 10 sometimes. They fit perfectly and never felt loose or like they'd slip off.
customer_reviews.author: call me JC

customer_reviews.title: Far too large, and the cushions are not attached.
customer_reviews.text: I chose these shoes on the strength of their customer reviews. They are wrong. I wear a men's 8EE so ordered the XL size. According to the size chart, this should be fine. Instead, these are at least 3 sizes too large. There is literally 3/4" of extra space after putting my feet in them. Also, the insert cushions are supposed to be glued in, but they came out as I tried on the shoes. I never give 1-star reviews but these are clearly not acceptable. Do not buy. They are going back immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M Chadwick

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FIT & COMFY
customer_reviews.text: These fit like a second skin. Walking around feels like a gentle foot massage. No slipping on wet floor and in pool. I tried on three pairs from other manufacturers and Cevinee fit the best! I wear women's size 11M shoes and XXL Cevinee fits me. I got the pink stripe.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger75

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the beach
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an alternative to the water shoes I typically find in stores. Those ones are always a little snug around the top and too flat in the front so my big toe scrapes the rubber and gets irritated. These water shoes are soft and stretchy so they don't pinch at the ankle. I was a little unsure on the sizing because of others' comments. I wear a women's size 11 (typically wide). I bought the XXL and they are just the right length to have a little space at the toe but not feel like my feet are sliding around in them.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Reads A Lot

customer_reviews.title: they're good. To me they run short and wide
customer_reviews.text: These just arrived, so no comment on durability. But they are comfy, attractive (and come in their own little zip pack). For the price, they're good. To me they run short and wide; the XXL is just barely long enough for my 10.5 size foot, but any larger would probably be too wide. Material is very flexible though; and the back doesn't bite into the heel. Nice little slipper.
customer_reviews.author: daphne

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable for short-term needs, but not made to last
customer_reviews.text: They served the intended purpose (I bought these for use during an aquatics program because I needed traction on the smooth bottom of the pool.) They gave me the traction I needed, though even buying the largest size they came in they almost didn't fit (and I only wear an 11 and a half shoe). They served me well in the aquatics program, surviving the 4 week program, but the inner soles were separating by the end, which really doesn't say much for the quality. In the end, they were an acceptable price for the short time I needed them, and served their purpose, but I can't really say I was overly impressed by them.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Clark

customer_reviews.title: Will work for camp shoes
customer_reviews.text: "Bumble bee" yellow and black striped shoe purchased. Feel fine and easy to slip on. 6.75 oz per pair. Would be 5.88 oz if taking out removable insoles (and shoes feel okay without them also). Additional 0.75 ounce if including plastic zipper sealed carry bag - which I may carry to keep hammock/tent clean - or just use a Ziplok bag. Purchased as camp/wading shoe when hiking/camping. Not quite as light as stated, but much better than my alternatives. Soles should be thick enough to protect feet from most rocks, but won't use for any significantly longer walks than around camp or to cross water ways.
customer_reviews.author: Grand Poobah

customer_reviews.title: Not for continuous use
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable, but I have replaced them in a quick amount of time due to them already showing wear from regular use for water aerobics. I noticed fraying within two wears. Again though they are very comfortable and not terrible considering the price. They look good on too. If you don’t mind having to be ready to replace them, they are worth it for just the comfort alone. Not good for consistent use, but if you buy them for a trip or two they will be great!
customer_reviews.author: Sheree

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat small
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and should be fine in the water, just a little small. I wear a women's 7 in everything so according to the size chart I got a medium because they said it was 6-7, and the large was 7.5-8.5. 7.5 is always too large so I went medium and it just fits my foot. My toes do rub in the front but since I will only need these every so often I'm not exchanging them.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product - could recommend!
customer_reviews.text: These water shoes are like thick socks and work quite well in the water. For the most part, sand does not get in the shoes. They are a good protection from hot sand. The trick is too take the insert out after use for drying. I purchases a size medium, my shoe size is 7.5. They fit very tight, almost too tight. Not sue if the next size would work, they might be too large and come off too easily in the water. I kept the medium. Another reviewer mentioned the insert bunches, it does not so much for me. I may try leaving them out next time I use them; they may dry faster and fit a bit better.
customer_reviews.author: faith124

customer_reviews.title: Cozy
customer_reviews.text: These water shoes are extremely light compared to some old lake shoes I used to wear. They were a little loose but when I stepped in the water they hugged my feet like a warm sunny day. I took them backpacking and when walking across water crossings,my feet did not hurt walking over rocks and stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hall

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay forn
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to like these based on reviews. My husband wore these once while paddle boarding and the thin liner on the sole fell off as soon as his foot was in the water. Once he pulled it off the sole kept slipping under his feet and he wound up going barefoot. The meshy top of the shoe looked cool but is a little too gimmicky for a grown man. I guess they can be worn like socks around the house if we don't throw them away.
customer_reviews.author: Erin M

customer_reviews.title: you buy these for vacations, don't expect to last forever
customer_reviews.text: great water shoes for walking on rocks, sand to get into the water. No support, no cushion.Just a thin rubber, non padded bottom. Stops your foot from sharp cuts, but you will feel 90% of what you walk on. Like walking barefoot but protection from things that could cut your feet. Good for people on cruise ships visiting beaches or 1/2 day island trips. In-expensive and very light. Maybe 1-3 season of use.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Grudzinski

customer_reviews.title: Tears easily
customer_reviews.text: My son was excited to have new water shoes, however, they tore after the first use. These were bought specifically to protect his feet on the concrete pool bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Horse lover

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable, Like Them A Lot!!
customer_reviews.text: I would have ordered a size 12 if available, but these are comfortable and will work perfect for the pool aerobics class I signed up for. For the money, I think they are a bargain. I just received them yesterday, so we will see how long they last. I am optimistic though and look forward to using them for the purpose I intended. The blue stripes are a bit funky, but they have lots of other styles to choose from. I purchased these because the plain black shoes were out of stock in my size.
customer_reviews.author: Jakesdad

customer_reviews.title: Godo product
customer_reviews.text: If you are just walking on the beach, this is a great product. For swimming & diving and any activity in the water not so good. I jump off the Clift in Jamaica my shoe surfaced before I did. I climbed the water fall in Jamaica and I had to really focus on keeping it on my foot. The slip resistance on the bottom was good. Just had to stay on my foot.
customer_reviews.author: J.G.

customer_reviews.title: Kind of small, and keep your feet sweaty.
customer_reviews.text: They fit kind of small. Also, they are meant to be used just in the water. Once you get out of the water, take them off immediately. Not recommend to walk around on them because the keep your feet wet and "prunny". Even when they are dry, they keep your feet sweaty. If you use them to walk around the house you might want to wear socks because the material they are made of keep your feet sweaty and uncomfortable. At least in my case who I suffer from sweaty feet. Not the case with everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Eden Joy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and utilitarian
customer_reviews.text: I actually like these much better than I initially thought I would. Since there are no seams, they are extremely comfortable, which is wonderful, as I use them primarily as slippers. I'm thrilled that they have non-skid, rubber-type bottoms, because I do go outside frequently in them. I recently took them on vacation with me, and I wore them non-stop for several periods of time. They're more than I would typically pay for slippers (or water shoes), but because they're also patriotic, that was an added plus for me.
customer_reviews.author: Christine C. Gaunder

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I was hoping.
customer_reviews.text: These are good for wearing in the water but that is it. So I have another pair of water shoes I was not happy with due to they let things like sand in. Well these do keep the sand out but they seem to take forever to dry. So your feet or soaked constantly. Also the bottoms are so thin that you can feel the smallest of rocks under your feet.
customer_reviews.author: MMcNeff

customer_reviews.title: Best water shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: These little water shoes are awesome. They dont slide off when in the water or mud. They are comfortable and move with you. The bottoms are thinner than some but I had no problems on gravel. Clean up is simple and I kept the little plastic case they come in to store and for easy travel. If they are a little wet still the case keeps them away from your other items. All around great product. I ended up buying my husband a pair and will get the kids some also.
customer_reviews.author: Crysha

customer_reviews.title: great for the pool side, bad for the beach
customer_reviews.text: They were wonderful for the pool. However, the tons of small holes lets lots and lots of sand into the shoes. While walking on the beach the shoes got bogged down and totally full of sand. I would not recommend this style for beach goers.
customer_reviews.author: TeletraanConvoy

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel, lightweight and quick dry
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for a recent trip and used them on many occasions during the trip. Definitely a good alternative over rubber slippers or bare feet. They are really good for places that can get wet or any other that are not appropriate for hard sole shoes. I like the convenience of the slip on and off. They don't feel soggy when wet and dry quickly. They are light and take up very little space in the luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Span

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with the sizing information - my shoes were way too small!
customer_reviews.text: I went by the sizing chart when ordering these shoes, I wear a women's size 6.5-7, so I ordered the medium. They are way too small. I can get them on, but they are so tight they actually hurt my feet. I am returning them. I do like the fact that the sole of these shoes is nice and thick compared to my FitKicks that I have been wearing. I am considering ordering them in the correct size to see how they do. Someone needs to look at the sizing chart to figure out the correct sizing for these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn L. Rockett

customer_reviews.title: Top tips very easily
customer_reviews.text: The top of the shoes is sooo thin and has like half circle cut ours all over . Everything gets snagged on them and they easily take. Needless to say I had a very unhappy kid when his toe kept coming through the top of the shoe while he was trying to swim and play with friends
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lou

customer_reviews.title: The picture does not lead you to believe their are ...
customer_reviews.text: The picture does not lead you to believe their are holes in the top of the pink shoe-there are! Which cause an excessive amount of sand to get in the shoes, which then weighs the shoes down and makes it hard to walk in them. I had no issues with the removable insert, but having multiple holes on the top of the shoe made beach day very difficult. Shoe fit well, I wear an 8.5.
customer_reviews.author: Tameka

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy water shoe for Aqua Track use, as well as other aquatics
customer_reviews.text: These have held up well for the last few months walking on an aqua track (in a community pool) 4-5x a week for about an hour. The soles are sturdy and flexible and the shoes are comfortable. They do run a bit large so they sometimes start to slip off in the water-- I would order a size down next time.They come in a nice plastic case, but I had to punch holes in it so that the shoes could dry while in it. They do take a while to dry, but that's not a deal breaker for me. I am happy with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: JAN

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I really had a hard time grading these. Its between a 4 and 5 star. I ordered two pair in two different sizes. They are nice looking and the perfect fit for the wider foot . But a little long in my toes area. I love the style and they are true to color. I got a Lg because I wear an 8. I am keeping them to use on vacation then Ill give them to my daughter who wears a size 9. My daughters size exlg fits perfectly to her size 9 narrow foot.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn

customer_reviews.title: bought for deadlift slippers
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable to wear as deadlift slippers, and grip well. I know this is not what they are sold for, but when I take out the inserts, they work perfectly, and are a lot less expensive, and more durable than what is sold as deadlift slippers. I will probably still use "real" deadlift slippers in competition -- because I don't know if these would be considered legal in competition
customer_reviews.author: Wally s

customer_reviews.title: $1 foam flip flops better
customer_reviews.text: Came packaged well. True to size, but not comfortable at all. Really tight and taut around the toes. The sole has no cushion or support. Feels like you're walking on a bare surface. Sand somehow seeped into the shoes. Took forever to wash up and clean. Could have done fine without and just stuck to $1 flip flops if you dont plan to go near any dangerously slick jagged areas.
customer_reviews.author: nmscougars

customer_reviews.title: Nice water shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is a good water shoe. I participate in water aerobics three times a week. so they have to hold up. I purchased a couple of pairs just in case they don't make it through the weeks ahead. So far after several weeks I'm still using the first pair. they are a little tattered and don't have much wear left so I'll probably be using the second pair next week. There is not much support and it fits just like a sock. So be careful if you are doing water aerobics in shallow water they will wear quickly. But overall this is a good shoe and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: LGT

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: I used these daily for a month, on walks to the beach and long sessions of swimming and aquawalking. They still look and feel exactly as they did the day I received them.Comfortable and durable (if you don't count a tendency of one of the insoles to come out of the shoe. Easy enough to put it back in. I just wish there were more sizes. The smaller size is definitely too small for me, but the one I have is a wee bit large. No fun stopping to pull up your shoe when you hit your stride.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, too small
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pair because I am mismated, one was a L and the other XL. The L is too small for a size 8 shoe but can the XL fit it. The XL is too small for a 9.5-10 size. Bought because of cost, but will return and buy better quality shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Dandelion

customer_reviews.title: the shoes served their purpose and I am happy enough with the product
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, just enough protection to allow me to fully enjoy the rocky beach with the family. Only thing not great is the soles come out with your foot and after they came out the first time I never quite got them to sit right again and they bunched under my foot just a bit. But the shoes served their purpose and I am happy enough with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Johnson

customer_reviews.title: great comfort
customer_reviews.text: bought them for our cruise that was scheduled for October 17. unfortunately cruise was cancelled because of covid 19. didn't get to use them but tried them on and they are great. no cruise for me but would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: marv coak

customer_reviews.title: work perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got these so I could do running workouts in my pool without slipping and they work great! I wear a size 10 or 10.5 in shoes and sandals, and a size 11 in boots and running shoes, and I find these a tad big. They stay on just fine though, and it's better than having them squish my feet if they were too small.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: As I want them to be in my best kept secret
customer_reviews.text: I almost don’t want to review these. As I want them to be in my best kept secret. But, I need to spread the love to everyone else. Super comfortable. No rubbing, no uncomfortable toes space. The shoes are absolutely wonderful for walking around the waterpark. Red or the lake, beach, or anything else you would wear water shoes for. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Brown

customer_reviews.title: Water exercise shoes
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really want to wear anything on my feet in the pool. However, my feet started to get torn up from the bottom of the pool during exercises. These are great! Once you get into the pool and begin moving, you barely remember that you have them on. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: K O

customer_reviews.title: Served a Role
customer_reviews.text: Went to the Big Island of Hawaii for a vacation. Thought to myself "Man I going to walking on some rocks," bought these bad boys off Amazon for a decent price. They served their purpose, but make sure you get a size that fits because if you don't its almost like your are swimming with fins on.
customer_reviews.author: Boody Youngblood

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoes for water exercise
customer_reviews.text: Using these for an Aquafit class and they are perfect. Light weight, fit snugly and don’t become waterlogged. They give just enough support and protect my feet from the bottom of the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Manda m Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Rather impressed with these. Fit as expected, flexible ...
customer_reviews.text: Rather impressed with these. Fit as expected, flexible enough to give me the barefoot walking experience while also allowing me not to feel the mystery items in the bottom of the lake that creep me out.
customer_reviews.author: Styrene

customer_reviews.title: Stylist water shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like these water shoes they are cute and stylist. I got them for camping and walking in muddy lake water. They can get stuck in mud and come off but easy to grab clean out and slip back on in the while water. The sole isn’t too thick walking would be the only thing I would suggest no hiking or things like that. Very easy to clean after the fun is over, I put mine in my washing machine and let them air dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Julian

customer_reviews.title: Like being barefoot, but with protection!
customer_reviews.text: I love the comfort of these shoes. I have problems with bone spurs on my feet and osteoarthritis in my right ankle, and one of the few things that gives me relief is to go barefoot or wear shoes that are like being barefoot. These fit the bill and add protection while giving all the benefits of going barefoot.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these last minute for a trip to Jamaica and took them in my bag without even trying them on so I was hoping they would fit. They did! Not only did they fit but the material was comfortable and they were of good quality. I was able to move from the pool to the Jacuzzi to the ocean with no issues and the shoes did well and dried quickly. I would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: jasmine powell

customer_reviews.title: No support on foot.
customer_reviews.text: What I don't like about this water shoe is that it allows the fit is too loose and the mesh bottom separated from the inside of the shoe. The shoe does not provide support on my foot while walking in the pool. I like the color combination.
customer_reviews.author: B. Strong

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and style!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is perfect I love it. I slip it on walk around house and even slipped on for quick walk to store. Is comfortable, flexible, and stylish. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: terri

customer_reviews.title: Great swim shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I just received these so I cannot speak to durability. I am a size 9 1/2 and these feel a tad small in length. I ordered an XL. However, I have very narrow feet so they feel wide and loose while I'm in the pool. I think for an average foot, these would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Orlowski

customer_reviews.title: Great for slippery floors!
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet, and had to take the insole out, but otherwise they fit as expected. I don't know how long they will last, but they help me around the house. I am disabled, and needed flat soled slippers, and these help with slippery floors.
customer_reviews.author: W. Roane

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable with anti-slip sole you can trust
customer_reviews.text: These Shoes are EXACTLY what I wanted. Minimalist, softest sole, anti-slip, breathable, super-comfortable to the point it feels like wearing socks. Recommended for barefoot walking/running fans that in some cases have to wear shoes. I will purchase more pairs for variety. The size is exact as mentioned. Delivery prompt.
customer_reviews.author: Kostas Trovas

customer_reviews.title: Wore them to the beach, A BIG MISTAKE! ...
customer_reviews.text: Wore them to the beach, A BIG MISTAKE!! Sand stays in them...They are stylish and light, but thats it...They were very slippery in the pool..will not wear them again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful! I bought them for water therapy and I also wear them around the house, which is all cold tile, to keep my feet warm on cold days. I highly recommend them. My feet swell at times and they stretch and fit well even during those times.
customer_reviews.author: SciFiFan

customer_reviews.title: All around perfect shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great. Just to walk around the house, water the grass, sit outside. For me they work perfect for water (pool) exercise.
customer_reviews.author: alwayz winn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product that's well-made and durable. Fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I liked it so much that I bought a second pair so I can have one for use in our pool while the other is being laundered. Highly recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Card

customer_reviews.title: Water slippers for gym showers, etc
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use on a cruise. Very light weight and have a plastic pouch for travel. Comfortable on the feet. These are not shoes. They are slippers for shower. Thin layer of rubber grip helps aid secure footing. Work great for my needs. Seller was prompt with order. I wear size 8 and the large fit close but is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sedona Lover

customer_reviews.title: cheap but not crappy
customer_reviews.text: perfect for our needs. my husband needed water shoes for river rafting. just exactly what we needed! they are pretty cheap though but if thats what you need then perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Kim

customer_reviews.title: Alzheimer's Must Have
customer_reviews.text: Great product for Alzheimer's patients. The care facility loves them. They are always running out of the slipper socks. My loved one is a little safer for now. Thank you! ❤
customer_reviews.author: Mouse Mistress

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: These were almost perfect! I got these because my fiancé and I were doing. Backcountry backpacking trip and wanted something that was light that we could wear around the campsite. These worked out perfectly. We even had to cross a river which these came in handy for. I liked that they had rubber soles. The only thing that was annoying was that the insoles kept moving and folding when you put the shoes on.
customer_reviews.author: M. Villareal

customer_reviews.title: Great for water, pool or river.
customer_reviews.text: Great fun socks. I used them for a trip in Havasupai falls. They are 0 drop so you can't walk miles with them without hurting your calves but they do wonder in the water. I got a size 12, I usually size 11 1/2 and my toes were touching the tip of the socks so they ended up fitting ok.
customer_reviews.author: Frenchyaz

customer_reviews.title: Great for beach activities
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for our girls trip to the Bahamas. I bought 5 pair and all the ladies loved them for beach time. Great in the water, easy to rinse and quick to dry. I wore mine pretty much every day for a week at the beach, to include kayaking and snorkeling. No issues with quality at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jones's

customer_reviews.title: and so our swim shoes allowed us to have fun without the pain of stepping on them
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these shoes to go swimming with family in the Guadalupe River. It is full of rocks, and so our swim shoes allowed us to have fun without the pain of stepping on them! They were perfect!
customer_reviews.author: firstboytwogirls

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: I like these because they’re comfortable, don’t take much space tp pack, and dry fast. I also like that they come in a plastic bag for storage or keeping them with dry items when they’re wet.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: If you have wide feet, go up a size.
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear 8.5 woman's shoe. I got the large (7.5 to 8.5) although my foot fits in this, it barely fits. I recommend going bigger, especially if your feet are leaning on the wide side. Other than that, I really like them.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. S

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and slip resistant
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to keep from slipping and they work really well. Comfortable sock-like fit. I even like the color. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: ChayilD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Water Shoes: Great Style & Exceptional Value!
customer_reviews.text: These are such a great value! I intend to order another pair. Worked great for rock scrambling in the Yuba River, stylish too- They are comfortable and the best water shoes I've had in this lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: M.G.

customer_reviews.title: Not good for water aerobics.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to use for water aerobics classes when I go on vacation but I found that they didn’t work for me. They had no grip and it was very frustrating to be slipping and not able to enjoy my classes. They’re good for walking on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Ana lopane

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight and compact. Not very durable.
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight and compact as they can be rolled into a ball. The material isn't high quality and will only last for several weeks/months depending on frequency of use. Do not wash these in a washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Brady

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Great water shoes. Wore these everywhere we went in vacation. Water park, canoeing, beach. They're awesome! Fit perfect, and very light weight
customer_reviews.author: Samantha T.

customer_reviews.title: Best fit and function.
customer_reviews.text: I participate in summer water aerobics, 2 hours in the morning and 1 hour in the evening. These are the most comfortable water shoes, and I have tried a lot of them. Not too heavy, and perform well.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Goines

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my husband and I. He wore his once in the pool, and they started to come apart after one wear. The quality of this product is extremely poor. I would not recommend purchasing these.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight shoes
customer_reviews.text: I plan to use these shoes in and around bodies of water. Even though I haven’t worn them around water yet, I can say they fit snugly, grip well, and, because they fold in half, fit in a small bag that’s included.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff S

customer_reviews.title: Office shoe
customer_reviews.text: I'm not using these for swimming, been using them around the office. Can't stand wearing dress shoes all day. Help my feet breath.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Zarate

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality
customer_reviews.text: The pair I revived with in 1 month the inner lining has came out and the heal is tearing. Not great quality...
customer_reviews.author: Love One Anther

customer_reviews.title: They work great. I have extremely wide feet and none of ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these in the therapy pool where I take water exercises. They work great. I have extremely wide feet and none of the typical water shoes fit me. These spread out wide enough to accommodate my wide feet. Price is great, too.
customer_reviews.author: Mainer

customer_reviews.title: They're fun.
customer_reviews.text: I use these for kayaking, and I like the fun colors and patterns. They're inexpensive enough to have several pairs, so my feet always match my kayaks (I have 4 kayaks, all different colors). Decent protection from rocks when we stop at gravel bars or have to portage.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Went to the Bahamas wore them everytime we went into the water.
customer_reviews.author: teresa fischer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: Flimsily made. Size seems to be off as they are a bit too big despite sizing to my shoes. Case is shoddily made. Unzipped and took out shoes, when I attempted to put them back in and close the zipper immediately broke.
customer_reviews.author: Darius Sayers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Rocky waters!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for Rocky waters! Even though the fit was a little big once you started walking you didnt even notice.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth N.

customer_reviews.title: Got hole after first use.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. Bought for my son for summer camp. Busted a hole in them the first day of camp and he wasn't able to use them.
customer_reviews.author: S Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great citizenship gift
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for fun citizenship gifts and ran across these fun shoes.
customer_reviews.author: P from Cali

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for a water park day
customer_reviews.text: Wore these at volcano bay for the day and they were comfortable and easy to put on and take off. The only downside is that they got a tiny hole in the toe towards the end of the day probably from my feet dragging at the bottom of the lazy river without realizing. They’re still good for a few more uses though so worth the money I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A return hist
customer_reviews.text: Is not true to size description given, running too small and then you charge me $7.72 for return shipping? Incredibly abusive. Amazon public need to be warned about this hist.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product, won’t last very long
customer_reviews.text: Lasted about six outings before the sole began tearing away from the neoprene material.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Scalia

customer_reviews.title: Practical
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for home gym environment. I wear these on my recumbent bike, where I need protection but not support, so much. I wear a size 9 in a "real shoe". Ordered a large & the fit is just right. I might need another pair for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Cash

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Fit
customer_reviews.text: These are great for water aerobics which I do 3 times/week. They adapt well to my wide foot and care comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Janet J.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, generous in size
customer_reviews.text: good quality, great experience. However, I misjudged size and had to return it
customer_reviews.author: LYNK

customer_reviews.title: A little loose
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it is just preference but I would rather these be a little tight than too loose and fall off in the ocean.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonPlatinumCustomer

customer_reviews.title: The shoes make it so easy to go in and come out without struggling
customer_reviews.text: The beach we go to in the Caribbean is a bit rocky near the shore. The shoes make it so easy to go in and come out without struggling! They fit great! I wear a 7 and got the medium, but the large also fit....so if you like comfort go bigger
customer_reviews.author: A. Causanschi

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this one. Slips on easily and wears like a pair of socks. I’m on my second pair.
customer_reviews.author: rjr96762

customer_reviews.title: Great swim shoes
customer_reviews.text: We bought them for my son last year and bought 2 more this summer. The updated version is more comfortable and more durable than last years pair. My son has psoarsis on the bottoms of his feet and is very self conscience. Swim shoes are too bulky but he loves these.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pair
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed wearing my shoes everytime I go to the river or beach
customer_reviews.author: Mel W

customer_reviews.title: Water shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Fits like a slipper, very comfortable to wear, walk and swim. Even got asked on the cruise where did I purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cristi

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: This product runs too small and too big. What happened to in between? We have standard shoes sizes in the US not one size fits all
customer_reviews.author: MillionaireMoM

customer_reviews.title: The best to keep you balanced!
customer_reviews.text: Water aerobics is a challenge for ladies my age, but these little shoes keep me safe and on my toes! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Bleyberg-forsman

customer_reviews.title: Cheap & Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: My husband wore his for the 2nd time. Already rip the top out & the bottom was wearing out so fast it gave him a blister.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Driehorst

customer_reviews.title: I love these, The blue was different when I got ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these, The blue was different when I got then but I wear these to the pool and they work great have not tried on the beach yet
customer_reviews.author: Paul Cantwell

customer_reviews.title: FOOR COMFORT MADE SIMPLE
customer_reviews.text: I like that besides the comfort, it complements my favorite colors.
customer_reviews.author: C. Green

customer_reviews.title: These fit really well and are comfortable! Unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: These fit really well and are comfortable! Unfortunately, they arrived packaged as new, but appeared scuffed at toes and seams as if worn. The big toes and front seams were scratched surfaces ...almost grayish in color. I have worn them twice and this only exaggerated the problem down the side seams now. Something wrong with the material. Also, the insert came out the very first time I wore them...only in one foot. The other one stayed in tact. Don't recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: kk123

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price / quality ratio. Easy to use. I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ok to buy
customer_reviews.text: Where size 12 shoe so bought xxxl, first wearing they were to tight, after a month of use stretched out just right. Seem to be holding up well to every day use in indoor therapy pool.
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: I am very satisfied with these water shoes
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with these water shoes. I like the fact that there is extra protection on the bottom. I walk and run laps in the fitness pool and these socks have not shown any wear on the bottom. I have 2 other pairs that I wore thru completely only after being worn twice. So will definitely order these again when they wear out.;
customer_reviews.author: Lynnda

product_meta.title: Cevinee Slip-on Water Shoes, Anti-Slip Athletic Aqua Socks, for Outdoor Pool Beach Swim Exercise Workout
product_meta.description:
"
Cevinee™ Skin-touch Barefoot Slip-on Water Shoes, Anti-slip Aqua Socks, Breathable Beach Swim Surf Yoga Outdoor Soft Shoes, Safe and Cozy Driving Shoes


Size Chart :

M -------- (US MEN'S, 5.5) ---------------- (US WOMEN'S, 6 – 7) 

L --------- (US MEN'S, 6 - 7) -------------- (US WOMEN'S, 7.5 - 8.5) 

XL -------- (US MEN'S, 7.5 - 8.5) --------- (US WOMEN'S, 9 - 10) 

XXL ------ (US MEN'S, 9 - 10) ------------ (US WOMEN'S, 10.5 - 11.5) 

XXXL ----- (US MEN'S, 10.5 - 11.5) ----- (US WOMEN'S, 12 - 13) 


Main features: 
-- Skin-touch feel
-- Breathable
-- Anti-slip
-- Quick-packing
-- Ergonomic design insole
-- Flexible cotton
-- Quick Drying
-- Great foot feeling


Recommended Usages: 
--aqua physical therapy 
--water aerobics/exercise 
--water park trip 
--fishing 
--beach activities 
--surfing 
--white water rafting/tubing 
--lake / river swiming 
--canoeing / kayaking 
--yoga / dancing exercise 
--workout fitness 
--showering 
--longtime driving 
--family outings 
--traveling 
--cycling 


Please check out the size in the picture before add to cart. 


Package contents: 
1 pair of soft water shoes with a compact carrying pouch 
"
feature_bullets: Comfortable to wear: Made of stretchy & breathable material and gives you barefoot experience and cozy feel.
Light & Anti-slip sole: Light-weight anti-slip sole gives you enough friction underwater.
Flexible & quick-drying: Just roll up the shoes and put them into the compact carrying pouch.
Stay on your feet: Ergonomic designed insole fit your feet snugly.
Multi-purpose usage: Perfect for water aerobics, aqua therapy, pool & beach activities, lake river swimming, yoga workout, longtime driving and much more.
